Thank you Jonny

Published by Ted on 09 Mar 2020. Contains tags related to: freeroll 

A few photos and a gleeful thank you out to Mr. Jonny Spicer. Thanks for a lovely dinner. Forturnately Jonny mis-stepped and lost our bet.
